members.joinCircumstances: Founded and leads the Phoenix Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Battle Against Accino Family
keyMoments.description: The Phoenix Pirates engage in battle with Campacino and the remaining Accino Family members to reclaim their honor.
keyMoments.significance: The Phoenix Pirates fight for their independence and honor after being captured by the Accino Family.

keyMoments.title: Promise to Sail to the New World
keyMoments.description: Puzzle promises to meet the Straw Hats again in the New World, declaring the Phoenix Pirates will continue their journey.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Phoenix Pirates' goal to reach the New World and reunite with the Straw Hats.

ships.description: The ship of the Phoenix Pirates, which had its Jolly Roger stolen by the Accino Family but recovered with help from the Straw Hats.

jollyRoger.description: A pirate flag featuring a phoenix design

name.japanese: アッチーノファミリー

members.joinCircumstances: Leader and patriarch of the Accino Family.
Born into the Accino Family as the eldest son.
Born into the Accino Family as the eldest daughter.
Born into the Accino Family as the youngest daughter.

keyMoments.title: Defeat of Don Accino
keyMoments.description: Don Accino is defeated by Luffy, marking the end of the Accino Family's dominance over the Ice Hunter region.
keyMoments.significance: The defeat of their patriarch ends the Accino Family's antagonist role in the arc.

keyMoments.title: Arbell and Lil's Reconciliation
keyMoments.description: The Accino sisters Arbell and Lil reconcile their relationship, showing a softer side to the bounty hunter family.
keyMoments.significance: Humanizes the Accino Family and shows they value family bonds despite their antagonist role.

keyMoments.title: Belated Birthday Celebration
keyMoments.description: The defeated Accino Family sails away and celebrates a belated birthday together, showing they've moved past their loss.
keyMoments.significance: Provides a lighthearted conclusion to the antagonists' story.

ships.description: The ship used by the Accino Family for their bounty hunting operations.

bases.description: The Accino Family's ice castle headquarters in Hyokaido, destroyed in Episode 335.

jollyRoger.description: The Accino Family does not use a traditional Jolly Roger as they are bounty hunters, not pirates.
